name: water-pulse
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe
flavor_text.emerald: Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the foe.
